# BDD Logspeed - International Road Transport Company

> Professional road transport and logistics services across Europe since 2016.

## About This Website

This is the official website of BDD Logspeed (S.C. BE DOUBLE D LOGSPEED S.R.L.), an international road transport company based in Arad, Romania.

## Company Information

- **Company Name:** BDD Logspeed (BE DOUBLE D LOGSPEED S.R.L.)
- **Founded:** 2016
- **Location:** Str. Slatinei, Nr. 2, Arad, Romania
- **CUI (Tax ID):** 35422580
- **Registration Number:** J02/58/2016

## Contact Information

- **Phone:** +40 755 297 614
- **Email:** office@bddlogspeed.ro
- **Facebook:** https://www.facebook.com/bdd.logspeed

## Services

BDD Logspeed provides international road transport services including:
- Full Truck Load (FTL) transport
- Less Than Truck Load (LTL) transport
- Freight transport across Europe
- National and international logistics

## Service Area

We operate across 12+ European countries including:
- Romania
- Germany
- France
- Italy
- Spain
- Hungary
- Poland
- Czech Republic
- Austria
- Netherlands
- Belgium
- United Kingdom

## Fleet

- 10 modern Mercedes-Benz trucks
- 110+ monthly shipments
- Equipped with latest tracking technology

## Key Statistics

- 8+ years of experience
- 10 trucks in fleet
- 12 countries served
- 110+ shipments per month

## Website Structure

- `/` - Home page with company overview, services, and fleet gallery
- `/about` - Detailed company information, mission, and values
- `/contact` - Contact form, phone, email, address, and map location

## Languages Supported

The website is available in 9 languages:
- English
- Romanian (Română)
- German (Deutsch)
- Hungarian (Magyar)
- French (Français)
- Italian (Italiano)
- Spanish (Español)
- Polish (Polski)
- Czech (Čeština)

## Technical Information

- Built with Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Responsive design for all devices
- Modern UI with Tailwind CSS

## How to Request a Quote

1. Visit the contact page at /contact
2. Fill out the contact form with:
   - What you need to transport
   - Loading and delivery locations
   - When goods will be ready
   - If palletized or bulk cargo
   - Weight of goods
3. Our team will respond with a quotation

## Business Hours

- Monday - Friday: 08:00 - 18:00
- Saturday: Available by appointment
- Sunday: Closed

---

For more information, visit https://bddlogspeed.ro or contact us directly.
